medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain began 2 days prior, improved somewhat yesterday but worsened again this morning upon awakening. No fever but experienced subjective chills. No nausea or vomiting but reported anorexia. No diarrhea at home, only loose bowel movements after oral contrast, and no constipation.
medical_history.family_history: Paternal side with significant coronary artery disease (father, uncle with myocardial infarctions). No cancer or diabetes mellitus.
